sentences.en: A vacuum flask keeps cool drinks cool and hot drinks hot.
sentences.cn: 保温瓶使冷饮保冷,使热饮保温.

sentences.en: He took a swig of whisky from his hip flask.
sentences.cn: 他猛灌了一口扁酒瓶中的威士忌.

sentences.en: He took out a metal flask from a canvas bag.
sentences.cn: 他从帆布袋里拿出了一个金属水瓶。

sentences.en: Put the flask over the fire.
She drank the neat whisky from the flask and shuddered a little when she swallowed.
sentences.cn: 她从扁瓶里喝了口纯威士忌,咽的时候哆嗦了一下.

sentences.en: She made sandwiches, filled a flask and put sugar in.
sentences.cn: 她做了三明治，把保温瓶灌满，又放了糖进去。

sentences.en: The flask is completely watertight, even when laid on its side.
sentences.cn: 即使平放，这个真空水杯也是滴水不漏。

sentences.en: The graduations are marked on the side of the flask.
The organic layer in the neck of the flask is aspirated into the atomic absorption burner.
sentences.cn: 满至烧瓶颈部的有机层被抽吸进入原子吸收燃烧器中.

sentences.en: The sample flask is immersed in a constant temperature bath.
sentences.cn: 将试瓶浸入恒温水浴中.

sentences.en: The vacuum flask has a strong casing, which won't crack or chip.
sentences.cn: 这种热水瓶瓶身坚固，不易断裂破碎。

sentences.en: There is some deposit in the bottom of the flask.
sentences.cn: 这只烧杯的底部有些沉淀物.

sentences.en: There was only a flask of water left in the entire well.
sentences.cn: 整口井里只剩下一瓶水了.

sentences.en: There's some sandwiches here and a flask of coffee.
sentences.cn: 这里有些三明治和一瓶咖啡。

sentences.en: We brought tea in a thermos flask.
sentences.cn: 我们用保温瓶携带茶水.

sentences.en: You should set up a reference flask.
sentences.cn: 你们应配备一只校正瓶.

trans.tran_cn: 瓶，长颈瓶，[化]烧瓶，火药筒，[机]沙箱
trans.tran_en: a special type of bottle that you use to keep liquids either hot or cold, for example when travelling
